column4: hellow :) i'm using audacious, and playing music from a samba mount, but it seems like it gives 'clicks' sometimes
any idea what could be the reason ?
i have bad cifs experiences too
in my case the access is blocked for a some ms
no fixes or bugreports of it ?
full ack. A latence timeout is ok but this fuu.. reaking driver blocks the io
you know if there is a bugreport about this issue ?
i decided to reformat my data stuff to ext4 and keep m$ as blob in a vm
trying to debug a bit with wireshark, but it seems all correct
with wireshark? I guess the protocol flow on the samba share is well. But the local driver blocks for some reasons i dont know
it lagged after the out-of-range reponse time :)
did set rize to 124K, and didn't had any buffer error yet :)
